banner.copy: TerraTrue is growing and we’re looking for talented people to help us build the future of privacy.
banner.headline: Join our team

perks.headline: A small team with big perks

single_perk.copy: We offer comprehensive PPO health, dental, and vision plans. And we pay 100% of the premiums for both you and your dependents. Because we want our team happy and healthy.
single_perk.headline: 100% paid benefits

single_perk.copy: We offer a limitless-vacation policy, generous parental leave, and the flexibility to work where you’ll be most in the zone. Because we know great teams thrive only when their team members thrive.
single_perk.headline: Work. Life. Balance.

single_perk.copy: We reward our team with generous equity packages so that they’ll share in our long-term success.
single_perk.headline: Equity

single_perk.copy: We love working with whip-smart people who challenge conventions, think creatively, and don’t take themselves too seriously. So we encourage everyone to speak up — and listen to each other.
single_perk.headline: Everyone has a Voice

why.box_copy: The only way we know how to build products that let teams thrive is by building a company where our own team thrives.
why.copy: We’re building the future of privacy. Our tools empower teams to work security and privacy into everything they do, all without impeding execution or dampening innovation. We’re doing all that as an early-stage company thanks to our passion, our know-how, and the help of impossibly talented people. We’re looking for folks who share our passion and pride in ego-less collaboration. But that’s not all. We’re building a company where collegiality, respect, and good old-fashioned generosity of spirit are non-negotiable traits.
why.headline: Why TerraTrue?
